definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Four of young Sika deer gathered at the meadow to eat grass in the night.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，四隻年輕的梅花鹿聚集喫草。

sentences.english: Pellet could improve remarkablely the energy digestibility of growing male deer.
sentences.chinese: 配合顆粒飼料能顯著提高育成公梅花鹿的能量消化率。

sentences.english: Objective To study on the antagonistic effect of sika deer immunologic cellular activity factor(DICAF) on immunosuppression.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究梅花鹿免疫細胞活性因子拮抗免疫抑制作用。

sentences.english: Urgent strategies are needed for the protection of South China Sika Deer subspecies.
sentences.chinese: 迫切需要採取有力措施加強對野生梅花鹿的保護。

definition: (bird species of China) red-crowned crane (Grus japonensis)
(bird species of China) common pheasant (Phasianus colchicus)
Père David's deer (Elaphurus davidianus), species of deer native to China that is critically endangered
(bird species of China) brown eared pheasant (Crossoptilon mantchuricum)
